citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:02 am on
15-Mar-17.
Contacted licensee by phone and left message. Discussion with one of the partners inspector found out she was
not available and the other was out out state..
